St. Albans, Hertfordshire Promoted by St Albans City Silver Prize Band Prizes: £7 and tenor horn, £4 and trombone, £2, £1 Waltz contest: 1. St. Alban's Abbey, 2. Dunstable Excelsior. 6 bands competed.
May 5, 2012, 8:48 a.m. July 8, 2019, 6:13 p.m.
1 St Alban's Abbey Randolph Ryan
2 Dunstable Excelsior John King Skinner
3 John Dickinson (Apsley) Band Randolph Ryan
4 Berkhamsted Volunteers H. Cannon
5 Dunstable Borough John Thomas Ogden
6 Watford Randolph Ryan
